channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Zelensky's conciliatory letter to Trump suggests he's run out of road
item.description: The Ukrainian leader's climb-down on security guarantees may be because the US is the only place he can turn to, writes BBC Ukraine correspondent Jame...

item.title: Gaza food aid scarce after Israel halts entry
item.description: The UN said at least 80 community kitchens may run out of stock, and remaining food rations will soon run dry.

item.title: Supreme Court upholds lower court order to force USAID to pay contractors

item.title: Man posing as NBA player rep swallows $769,000 in stolen Tiffany jewelry
item.description: The Texas man allegedly asked jail staff if he would be "charged with what's in my stomach."

item.title: First-time driver's guide to car insurance: What to expect
item.description: Understanding car insurance basics is a vital first step for every new driver. Here's everything to consider now.

item.title: Lesotho shocked by Trump's remarks that 'nobody has heard of the country'
item.description: Lesotho says it is surprised by Trump's comments given its "warm and cordial" relations with the US.

item.title: Many feared dead in Sudan after shelling hits crowded market
item.description: The market, in a camp for displaced people, was attacked for roughly two hours, a local official says.

item.title: Despite weather concerns, New Orleans celebrates Mardi Gras Day and bids farewell to Carnival season
Rep. Sylvester Turner dies at 70, weeks after taking office
item.description: The cause of death is unclear. Turner took office weeks ago, filling the seat left vacant by the death of Rep. Sheila Jackson Lee.
